description.text: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Здесь нет мифов, только выбор героев. Два куба и база.

es.original: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Aquí no hay deidades griegas sino héroes cúbicos.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Statt griechischer Legenden habt ihr Helden hier das Sagen. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Aqui não tem nenhum deus grego, só um monte de heróis destemidos. Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: No Greek legends, just a selection of Heroes.  Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Les divinités grecques ont laissé place aux héros. Deux cubes et une base.
